LanguageData.Adrenaline.AllowNaturalGain_ToolTip: Determines whether or not pawns naturally gain adrenaline in combat or when taking damage.
LanguageData.Adrenaline.AffectDownedPawns_ToolTip: Determines whether or not a pawn still naturally gains adrenaline when they are downed.
LanguageData.Adrenaline.AllowAdrenalineCrashes_ToolTi: Determines whether or not pawns get adrenaline crashes after adrenaline rushes - a short-term penalty that primarily reduces the pawn's consciousness.
